name: Miyuki
cleanBio: “The Doctor DJ” Miyuki left her career in science to pursue her lifelong passion – music. Now a rising EDM producer and DJ based in Chicago, USA, Miyuki is dedicated to creating music that moves not only the body, but also the heart. Drawing from her experiences of trauma, healing, and love, Miyuki tells her story through evocative songwriting, ethereal melodies, and hard-hitting grooves. Her tracks consistently top the Beatport Trance Top 100 charts, and have garnered support from A-listers such as Armin van Buuren, Andrew Rayel, and Aly and Fila. Breaking into the music scene with hard work and overflowing passion, MIYUKI’s weekly DJ livestreams attract 600-1000 dedicated viewers, making her the top 0.1% of most-watched channels on the Twitch livestreaming platform. Though she specializes in trance, MIYUKI shows great versatility as a DJ, artfully incorporating other genres such as techno, hardstyle, and melodic dubstep into her DJ sets. The support from MIYUKI’s massive online fanbase has also translated to festival bookings and successful headlining shows. With a dedicated fanbase all over the world and more original music on the way, MIYUKI’s artistry continues its captivating journey in 2023.
